For everyone complaining about the keygen not working, most, if not all virus scanners, classify cracks & keygens as virus. If it disappears whenever you try to extract and run the keygen, disable your AV software then try again.

Hi Juliantje Your English is better than my Dutch!
Thanks for the 'get around' for cracking. I loaded it first time and all was great. PC crashed, rebuit the XP OS and now was having the problem you have just solved. IT WORKS FINE FOLKS,

This torrent doesn't contain the launcher that's required to be able to activate the program.  Look for another torrent that contains GP6Runner.exe and download just that file (this torrent is legit, it's just missing the launcher).  ALWAYS run the program using GP6Runner.exe and you'll have no problems.

However, I will say this to all of you who haven't gotten it to work yet: you're not missing anything, this version is complete trash.  The RSE sounds like shit, the program itself is slower than shit, and you can no longer use all of the GM drum kits (like the orchestral kit and the sound effects kit), there's just five regular kits.  Oh, and for those of you that have all the drum tab numbers memorized, you can't tab out drums anymore...you have to point and click every single hit on the regular sheet music section.

If you wanna check this out then just do what I mentioned in the first paragraph...if you want an actual useful program then skip this download and stick with GP5.

Open the keygen program and paste the code in the top textbox. Press generate. You get a new code. This one you paste in the screen you got earlier when you pressed the activate offline button. And that's it ;)

Totally 100% legit as long as you follow the instructions listed through the comments of writing random numbers in the activation id and key boxes and then copying the "secret code" which is received after choosing offline activation. copy that into the top box of key gen and there ya go ^_^ awesome, props to uploaded Thanks!

Rock on man, got it working.

To use the key gen, write random numbers in User ID until it fills, and it will automatically take you to the Key ID spot, type random numbers til it is filled, then click offline activation. Copy the top set of random characters and paste into the top box of the keygen, then click generate to get your activation key. Then paste that key into the bottom box and done.
